snippet: Just days after federal agents seized two computer networks used to distribute ransomware, security researchers said a new exploit kit was being used to distribute ransomware with disturbing success rates.
abstract: Just days after federal agents seized two computer networks used to distribute ransomware, security researchers said a new exploit kit was being used to distribute ransomware with disturbing success rates.

headline.main: Days After a Federal Seizure, Another Type of Ransomware Gains Ground
